title: Episode 17: Will Nats Fans Have To Race To The Metro Station?
dc:creator: Martin Di Caro
description: As playoff baseball returns to Washington, D.C., thousands of Nationals fans could face a choice: Stay for the end of a game, or leave early to catch the right Green Line train? Also, we discuss the acute misery of Blue Line riders: New data suggest their Metrorail experience is the worst in the system.
